title: Revaluation
content: I just reviewed my SDS paper and i need 4 marks to increase my grade.  Should i apply for reval?

comments.body: Don't think that has ever happened

I would also like to warn you that some times they dont increase the marks.. I expected some marks (Verified from answer key, I was supposed to get 3-4 marks) in physics in   sem 1 , I got scammed , lost 1k :(
